page.title: 19Living in Bwlchysarnau
page.content: In Bwlchysarnau it is very quiet and peaceful.It is a very pleasant place to live, but there are a few disadvantages. There are no shops, there are no pubs for adults and it can be very boring for young people because there isn't a lot to do in the evenings. One of the worst things is that Bwlchysarnau is on a hill so you have to walk up to see your friends! The good thing is that it snows a lot and you miss school, and there are some good hills for sledging. As it is a small village you know all the neighbours and they are very friendly. by Laura Bass aged 12
